xwikidoc.name: Swagger Macro
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Swagger Macro
xwikidoc.content:
This macro allows to display [[OpenAPI>>https://swagger.io/specification/]] specifications directly in your wiki.
Example:
{{code}} {{swagger displayOperationId="false" proxy="false" showCommonExtensions="false" displayRequestDuration="false" showExtensions="false"}} openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Sample API description: Optional multiline or single-line description in [CommonMark](http://commonmark.org/help/) or HTML. version: 0.1.9
servers: - url: http://api.example.com/v1 description: Optional server description, e.g. Main (production) server - url: http://staging-api.example.com description: Optional server description, e.g. Internal staging server for testing
paths: /users: get: summary: Returns a list of users. description: Optional extended description in CommonMark or HTML. responses: "200": # status code description: A JSON array of user names content: application/json: schema: type: array items: type: string {{/swagger}} {{/code}}
{{swagger displayOperationId="false" proxy="false" showCommonExtensions="false" displayRequestDuration="false" showExtensions="false"}} openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Sample API description: Optional multiline or single-line description in [CommonMark](http://commonmark.org/help/) or HTML. version: 0.1.9
servers: - url: http://api.example.com/v1 description: Optional server description, e.g. Main (production) server - url: http://staging-api.example.com description: Optional server description, e.g. Internal staging server for testing
paths: /users: get: summary: Returns a list of users. description: Optional extended description in CommonMark or HTML. responses: "200": # status code description: A JSON array of user names content: application/json: schema: type: array items: type: string {{/swagger}}

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{velocity}} #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Macros.Swagger Macro')) ## Static map of camelCase to kebab-case parameter names to respect https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn_web_development/Howto/Solve_HTML_problems/Use_data_attributes #set($camelToKebabMap = { "displayOperationId": "display-operation-id", "operationsSorter": "operations-sorter", "supportedSubmitMethods": "supported-submit-methods", "tagsSorter": "tags-sorter", "userName": "user-name", "url": "url", "token": "token", "docExpansion": "doc-expansion", "defaultModelRendering": "default-model-rendering", "filter": "filter", "proxy": "proxy", "validatorUrl": "validator-url", "password": "password", "showCommonExtensions": "show-common-extensions", "maxDisplayedTags": "max-displayed-tags", "displayRequestDuration": "display-request-duration", "showExtensions": "show-extensions" }) ## We create a div with all the parameters provided by the user. {{html}}
## If the proxy is enabled all the request to get the OpenAPI specifications will be made by the backend and stored in the swaggercontent. #if ($wikimacro.parameters.proxy == true) 
  #set ($params = {
    "url": $wikimacro.parameters.url,
    "accessToken": $wikimacro.parameters.token,
    "username": $wikimacro.parameters.userName,
    "password": $wikimacro.parameters.password
  })
  $services.swagger.executeProxy($params)
#elseif ($wikimacro.content && $wikimacro.content != "") ##invisible div
#end
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
